DashboardPage.heroDescription: A Next.js SaaS boilerplate with authentication, subscriptions, and a beautiful UI. Built with Next.js, NextAuth.js, Stripe, and Tailwind CSS.
DashboardPage.feature1Description: Leverage the power of modern web technologies for optimal performance and developer experience.
DashboardPage.feature2Description: Robust database solution with an intuitive ORM for efficient data management and scalability.
DashboardPage.feature3Description: Seamless payment processing and subscription management with industry-leading Stripe integration.
DashboardPage.ctaDescription: Explore the codebase on GitHub or deploy your own instance today.

DraftPrivacyPage.introductionText: This Privacy Policy describes how we collect, use, and disclose your personal information when you use our services.
DraftPrivacyPage.informationWeCollectText: We collect information you provide directly to us, such as when you create an account, use our services, or communicate with us. This may include:
DraftPrivacyPage.personalIdentificationInfo: Personal identification information (Name, email address, etc.)
DraftPrivacyPage.usageData: Usage data (how you use our services)
DraftPrivacyPage.technicalData: Technical data (IP address, browser type, etc.)
DraftPrivacyPage.howWeUseYourInformationText: We use the information we collect for various purposes, including to:
DraftPrivacyPage.provideMaintainImproveServices: Provide, maintain, and improve our services.
DraftPrivacyPage.processTransactions: Process your transactions and send you related information.
DraftPrivacyPage.communicateWithYou: Communicate with you, including responding to your inquiries and sending you updates.
DraftPrivacyPage.monitorAnalyzeTrends: Monitor and analyze trends, usage, and activities in connection with our services.
DraftPrivacyPage.detectInvestigatePrevent: Detect, investigate, and prevent fraudulent transactions and other illegal activities.
DraftPrivacyPage.sharingYourInformationText: We may share your personal information with third parties in the following circumstances:
DraftPrivacyPage.serviceProviders: With service providers who perform services on our behalf.
DraftPrivacyPage.legalRequest: In response to a legal request or process.
DraftPrivacyPage.protectOurPremium: To protect our premium, property, or safety, or the premium, property, or safety of others.
DraftPrivacyPage.mergerAcquisition: In connection with a merger, sale of company assets, financing, or acquisition of all or a portion of our business by another company.
DraftPrivacyPage.dataSecurityText: We implement reasonable security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.
DraftPrivacyPage.yourChoicesText: You may review, update, or delete your account information by logging into your account settings. You may also opt out of receiving promotional communications from us by following the instructions in those communications.
DraftPrivacyPage.childrensPrivacyText: Our services are not intended for children under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13. If we become aware that a child under 13 has provided us with personal information, we will take steps to delete such information.
DraftPrivacyPage.internationalDataTransfersText: Your information may be transferred to, and maintained on, computers located outside of your state, province, country, or other governmental jurisdiction where the data protection laws may differ from those of your jurisdiction.
DraftPrivacyPage.yourPremiumText: Depending on your jurisdiction, you may have certain premium regarding your personal information, including the right to access, correct, or delete your data. Please contact us to exercise these premium.
DraftPrivacyPage.changesToPrivacyPolicyText: We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page. You are advised to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any changes.
DraftPrivacyPage.contactUsText: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at [Your Contact Email].

DraftTermsPage.title: Terms of Service
DraftTermsPage.section1_content: By accessing or using our services, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service and all terms incorporated by reference. If you do not agree to all of these terms, do not use our services.
DraftTermsPage.section2_content: We reserve the right to modify or update these Terms at any time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Terms on this page. Your continued use of the services after any such changes constitutes your acceptance of the new Terms.
DraftTermsPage.section3_content1: You may need to create an account to access certain features of our services. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials and for all activities that occur under your account.
DraftTermsPage.section3_content2: You agree to provide accurate, current, and complete information during the registration process and to update such information to keep it accurate, current, and complete.
DraftTermsPage.section4_content1: You agree not to use our services for any unlawful purpose or in any way that could harm, disable, overburden, or impair the services.
DraftTermsPage.section4_content2: Prohibited activities include, but are not limited to:
DraftTermsPage.section4_list_item1: Uploading or transmitting any content that is unlawful, harmful, threatening, abusive, harassing, defamatory, vulgar, obscene, or otherwise objectionable.
DraftTermsPage.section4_list_item2: Attempting to gain unauthorized access to any part of the services, other accounts, computer systems, or networks connected to the services.
DraftTermsPage.section4_list_item3: Interfering with or disrupting the integrity or performance of the services or data contained therein.
DraftTermsPage.section5_content1: All content, trademarks, service marks, trade names, and logos on our services are proprietary to us or our licensors and are protected by intellectual property laws.
DraftTermsPage.section5_content2: You may not use, reproduce, distribute, modify, or create derivative works of any content from our services without our express written permission.
DraftTermsPage.section6_content1: Our services are provided "as is" and "as available" without any warranties of any kind, either express or implied, including, but not limited to, implied warranties of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, or non-infringement.
DraftTermsPage.section6_content2: We do not warrant that the services will be uninterrupted, error-free, secure, or free from viruses or other harmful components.
DraftTermsPage.section7_content: To the fullest extent permitted by applicable law, in no event shall we be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages, or any loss of profits or revenues, whether incurred directly or indirectly, or any loss of data, use, goodwill, or other intangible losses, resulting from (a) your access to or use of or inability to access or use the services; (b) any conduct or content of any third party on the services; (c) any content obtained from the services; and (d) unauthorized access, use, or alteration of your transmissions or content, whether based on warranty, contract, tort (including negligence), or any other legal theory, whether or not we have been informed of the possibility of such damage, and even if a remedy set forth herein is found to have failed of its essential purpose.
DraftTermsPage.section8_content: These Terms shall be governed and construed in accordance with the laws of [Your Jurisdiction], without regard to its conflict of law provisions.
DraftTermsPage.section9_content: If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact us at [Your Contact Email].
